purpose: Facilitates the creation and management of composable workflows for CI/CD and AI agents.
principle: Builds on containerization and GraphQL to create flexible, reusable workflows that can be easily composed and managed.
reusability: Highly composable with support for containerized workflows and integration via GraphQL APIs.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex workflows and integrations.
name: dagger
description: An open-source runtime for composable workflows. Great for AI agents and CI/CD.
highlight: Enables seamless integration of CI/CD workflows with advanced caching and containerization capabilities.
